thumb.title: Tsuki no hikari / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Tsuki no hikariAs the city lights start to go out, the night breeze gently caresses my cheeks.街の灯りが消え始める頃静かに夜風が頬を撫でるI stand by the window and the light of the full moon floats there, gently enveloping me.窓辺に立つと そこに浮かぶ満月の光 優しく包むAs the day ends, in the silence, memories flow and fill my heart.一日が終わる 静寂の中思い出が流れ 心満たすIt's as if the moon is quietly watching over me, accepting all my joy and sorrow.喜びも悲しみも すべてを受け止め静かに月が見ているみたいOn a night when the moonlight pours down, I feel its warmth as it embraces me.月の光 降り注ぐ夜に抱きしめてくれる 温もりを感じてWith hope for tomorrow hidden in my heart, the moonlight gently guides me.明日への希望 胸に秘めて月の光 優しく導いてくれるMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : ᎫᏉЅ
